text: Lɨhavɨci 10.42-43 Lu 22.25-26 Jisasɨ nulɨdɨ abɨci nudɨ micɨ vehavɨmalɨ. Vehavɨci abamalɨ. Hɨdɨlɨ mu mu agɨladɨ manɨgali agɨlaŋ ibi daŋ hɨnihɨniŋ nɨman abahɨdavi uamalɨ. Alaŋ nuken ibi daŋ hɨnidalu aba abahɨdavi uamalɨ. Haman lɨdɨŋ kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨladɨ abavɨdaci kavɨ kavɨ salaku vihɨdavi uamalɨ. Nulɨdɨ kulaŋ hadi hadi agɨlaŋ aveji kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨladɨ ciaŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ sɨbam abahɨdavi uamalɨ. Aludɨ ciaŋ agɨladɨ lɨbiakɨlavɨdɨ aba ciaŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ sɨbam abahɨdavi uamalɨ.
